languages.text: "Благодарю за щедрость, господин Ханейманн. Но лучше позволю своим воспоминаниям взорвать мне голову, чем избавлюсь от них".
"Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за щедрость, господин Ханейманн. Но лучше позволю своим воспоминаниям взорвать мне голову, чем избавлюсь от них".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “感谢你的慷慨，哈努曼大师。但就算我的记忆会把我逼疯，我也不愿将它们从我的脑海中清除。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."

traits.locale_text: “感谢你的慷慨，哈努曼大师。但就算我的记忆会把我逼疯，我也不愿将它们从我的脑海中清除。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Merci pour votre générosité, maître Haneumann, mais je préfère de loin garder mes souvenirs plutôt que de les perdre à jamais, quitte à devenir fou. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour votre générosité, maître Haneumann, mais je préfère de loin garder mes souvenirs plutôt que de les perdre à jamais, quitte à devenir fou. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias por su generosidad, maestro Haneumann, pero preferiría que mis recuerdos me hicieran enloquecer que borrarlos de mi mente».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por su generosidad, maestro Haneumann, pero preferiría que mis recuerdos me hicieran enloquecer que borrarlos de mi mente».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「寛大なお心に感謝します、マスター・ヘニュマン。ですが、私はこの記憶を心の外に逃すのではなく、むしろ怒りを燃やす燃料としたいのです」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."

traits.locale_text: 「寛大なお心に感謝します、マスター・ヘニュマン。ですが、私はこの記憶を心の外に逃すのではなく、むしろ怒りを燃やす燃料としたいのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Danke für Eure Großzügigkeit, Meister Haneumann, doch ich lasse mich lieber von meinen Erinnerungen in den Wahnsinn treiben, als sie aus meinem Verstand zu tilgen."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Eure Großzügigkeit, Meister Haneumann, doch ich lasse mich lieber von meinen Erinnerungen in den Wahnsinn treiben, als sie aus meinem Verstand zu tilgen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."

languages.text: "Cömertliğin için teşekkürler Üstat Haneumann ama anılarımı beynimden sildirmektense onlar yüzünden delirmeyi tercih ederim."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your generosity, Master Haneumann, but I would rather let my memories drive me mad than purge them from my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Cömertliğiniz için teşekkürler Üstat Haneumann ama anılarımı beynimden sildirmektense onlar yüzünden delirmeyi tercih ederim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
